title: Farm Game Sounds
description: 147 high-quality sound effects specially crafted to help you put sound to your farming games.
longDescription:
Farm Game Sounds: 147 high-quality sound effects specially crafted to help you put sound to your farming games.


YouTube link (hear the audio preview of the 147 SFX)

Soundcloud link (hear the audio preview of the 147 SFX)

Tracklist PDF


They are divided in:

  • Hits on different surfaces (stone, wood, grass, harvest, earth, etc.)
  • Ambiances (Birds, crickets, rain, bonfire, cave, etc.)
  • Animal sounds (Farm, chickens, pigs, dogs, cows, etc.)
  • Events (tree falling, fishing, plant seed, irrigate plants, etc.)
  • Objects (chest sounds, tool whooshes)
  • Vocal Efforts
  • Footsteps


More about the pack:

  • Intuitive file naming.
  • All you'll ever need regarding farm game sounds.
  • Covers a lot of gameplay situations.


[Professional audio services]

For custom music, sound design, sound engineering or any other game audio services, please send a mail to: audioalchemiststore@gmail.com
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 147 Farm SFX
  • Intuitive File Naming
  • The SFX covers different gameplay situations

Number of Audio Waves: 147

Number of Audio Cues: 147

Sample Rate/Bit Rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Do Sound FX Loop: Yes

Minutes of Audio Provided: 4 minutes
